name: Risky Dice Dungeon
description:
In this dungeon-crawler you have to roll your Stats, your Enemys Stats and the Items you get with 3 Different Dice.

  • Safe Dice
  • Normal Dice
  • Risky Dice 

These Dice create a risk-reward system, wich works together with the randomly generated dungeons.

This is the first game I have ever finished and sadly, I didn't have enough time to fix all the Bugs. I also had to cut out many planned features and simple things like a Settings menu.

Bugs I know of:

  • After killing the Boss, nothing happens
  • Each time you die, more rooms appear in the dungeon
  • Bullets go through Enemys.

I hope you can still enjoy the game and leave me critique.

I had a lot of fun making this Game and learnt a lot.
